function.prompt:
Write UNIT_TEST_CLASS_NAME tests for the METHOD_NAME in CLASS_TO_TEST class. Guideline:
- Test file should be complete and compilable, without need for further actions. - Ensure that each test focuses on a single use case to maintain clarity and readability. - PHP test file MUST starts with php opening tag ?php - Write a description of the class and the method being tested. - Generated test class should be in namespace `TEST_NAME_SPACE`

Please enter the method to test
Please enter the name of the unit test class name
Please enter the test name space
